title: Lucasarts classics X3
description:
Go classics... LUCASARTS classics.

This pack contains the most memorable classics from DOS era of golden gaming. (at least they were for me this important)

In pack included are:
Monkey Island 1 (ultimate talkie version)
Monkey Island 2 (ultimate talkie version)
Day of the Tentacle (cd-rom talkie version)

Packs are built around DOSBOX (yhkwong SVN build) which comes with proper mt-32 emulation with required .rom files (they sound SOOOO much better than old fashion soundblaster sounds)

Monkey islands were ripped from remastered versions but they will all run now on native ms-dos as well if you have all the equipment (incl. physical mt-32 midi for music). Tools for ripping was found at http://www.gratissaugen.de/ultimatetalkies/ (no monkeys were harmed during the process)

To play, just extract .rar files for each game and start dosbox.exe to run the game. Refer to end of dosbox.conf for additional supplied commands used to making the packs fully automatic.

Ingame keys; F5 to save/load, CTRL+T to switch to enable voice/subtitles and CTRL+X to exit game (when and if completely bored))

Have fun gaming and happy new year.
